description: The file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing basic endpoints for the application, including welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the service is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Builds a URL to Swagger UI and redirects the request there, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns application information, specifically the name 'intelligentchatbotservice'.
